name: 華語方言教材教法
description: The design of this course is based on the training of teachers for teaching Chinese dialects. The writing example is based on Taiwanese Hokkien as the teaching language, which can be applied to the teaching of other dialects according to the teacher's expertise and the needs of the students taking the course. The content of the course includes the general situation of Taiwanese Hokkien language teaching in Taiwan, and in the United States and in Japan.  We will introduce the current representative Taiwan Hokkien textbooks and reference books, and compile teaching materials and discuss teaching methods. Teaching content includes Taiwanese language origin, Taiwanese Hokkien Roman pinyin, Taiwan Hokkien pronunciation (consonants, finals, tones, consonants, tone sandhi, colloquial and literal pronunciation, phonological rules), introduction to morphology, grammatical structure, pragmatics, Taiwanese Hokkien journals, Taiwan Hokkien website, Taiwan Hokkien computer word processing and writing of lesson plans: including teaching objectives, teaching content, teaching time, teaching activities, teaching steps, teaching materials and teaching aids. In addition, there will be trainings in listening, speaking, reading and writing in Taiwanese Hokkien. Since most students learning Chinese dialects have a background in Mandarin, the comparison between Mandarin/Mandarin and Taiwanese Hokkien can help students master the dialect more quickly.

9.  華語方言聽力訓練
10.  華語方言口語訓練
11.  華語方言閱讀教學
